job.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>NOTE: Any visa fine but PASSPORT Must.</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Immediate&nbsp;Openings Full Stack JAVA Developer for Portland, OR (Any visa fine)&nbsp;</p><p> Hello,</p><p> I Hope you are doing great. Please find the below Job Descriptions and revert me with a suitable resume.</p><p> </p><p> Job Title: Full Stack JAVA Developer</p><p> Location:&nbsp;Portland, OR</p><p> Duration: Contract</p><p>Skills:</p><ul><li>7-10 years workable</li><li>J2EE developer with reactJS, Node JS, Spring Boot, AWS, CSS ,Java Script, API</li><li>Type Script</li><li>Working experience on Lambda</li><li>Must have debugging skills.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Thanks &amp; Regards,</strong></p><p><strong>Rajesh Kondu,</strong></p><p><strong>Email: Rajesh@dvgts.com</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Direct: (609) 994-0617 Ext 126</strong></p><p><strong>Phone : +91 9676168391</strong></p><p><strong>DVG Tech Solutions LLC.</strong></p>
